Method.desc: Display a large centered alert on the main screen.
Method.doc:
Display a large centered alert on the main screen.

Parameters:
 * message - The string message to display.
Method.name: centerAlert
parameters: * message - The string message to display.

Method.doc:
Start the HTTP server.

Returns:
 * The InfoServer object
Method.name: start

Method.desc: Stop the HTTP server and remove any displayed task info.
Method.doc:
Stop the HTTP server and remove any displayed task info.

Returns:
 * The InfoServer object
Method.name: stop

Method.desc: Update the on-screen task info display.
Method.doc:
Update the on-screen task info display.

Parameters:
 * data - A table containing the task info. Expected keys: `doer`, `task_name`, `time_slot`.
Method.name: updateTaskInfoDisplay
parameters: * data - A table containing the task info. Expected keys: `doer`, `task_name`, `time_slot`.
